verses.roman:
rājā kahe,-sabe jagannātha nā dekhiyā
caitanyera vāsā-gṛhe calilā dhāñā

synonyms: rājā kahe—the King said; sabe—all of them; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; nā dekhiyā—without visiting; caitanyera—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vāsā-gṛhe—to the residential place; calilā—they went; dhāñā—running.
translation: The King said, "Instead of visiting the temple of Lord Jagannātha, all the devotees are running toward the residence of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu."
